TopicTitle: AeroSpace XM-19 Bomber VTOL "Not no ordinary VTOL"

Articles.Content:
**AeroSpace XM-19 Bomber VTOL**

![em1EzXq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/em1EzXq.jpg)

**In Flight Photos:**

![jkqEViS.png](http://i.imgur.com/jkqEViS.png)

**The bomber is equipped with four .6 ton bombs equivalent to 1/2 the power output of a thermonuclear bomb. It launches unguided bombs with no thrust. Ideally, drop the bombs with a vertical speed of 5 or less. It provides near dead accuracy with it's ejection manifolds. Its fastest over land speed is around 130 meters per second.**

![KvpWHo7.png](http://i.imgur.com/KvpWHo7.png)

**Simple yet complex design allows for stable flight while VTOL engine provides enough lift to add four more bombs** ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

![e96HK5i.png](http://i.imgur.com/e96HK5i.png)

**During takeoff, it is recommended you tip your aircraft at an inclination of 15 degrees to prevent lateral speed from occurring until your reach your designated altitude.**

![4p7RKdc.png](http://i.imgur.com/4p7RKdc.png)

**VAB, say hello to my little friend, it's called BOMBS \*AKA FUEL TANKS\***

![T3OUrdR.png](http://i.imgur.com/T3OUrdR.png)

**Release the bombs and watch the VAB burn in an enormous bonfire.**

![SIw8sDB.png](http://i.imgur.com/SIw8sDB.png)

**Moments after the bombing the VAB stood, but Jeb took no such loss, he went out with a blazing fireball of glory.**
